section.title: Designate Initial Configuration
section.p: After the installation has been completed, Designate requires some initial configuration in order to operate.

section.title: Identify Nameserver Public IPs
section.p: Depending on the Backend chosen, the method used to identify the nameserver's public IP will differ.

ol.li: On the lifecycle manager, locate and open the ~/helion/my_cloud/info/CloudDiagram.txt file.
Find the Control Plane, and Cluster within, which contain the powerdns or bind service-components.
Find the IPs of each servers EXTERNAL-API network. These are used as the Nameserver Public IPs
InfoBlox will act as your public nameservers, consult the InfoBlox management UI to identify the IPs
Not Applicable - Skip to "Register Nameserver Entries"
